en.title: Photos SON 4, Mandarin Training @ Empress Hotel, Sepang, Malaysia 28th - 29th March 2009.
en.content:
FE's 4th Mandarin SON (School of Networking), was held recently at the Empress Hotel, Sepang, Malaysia from 28th - 29th March 2009. SON is a highly interactive, entertaining and extremely impact workshop that will turn your MLM networking into a RM 1,000,000 enterprise! Participants are taught invaluable Leadership Skills, Presentation Skills, Goal Setting, Overcoming Challenges, etc. 

A BIG THANK YOU to Trainers Lenny Painin and Jacky Cheng and to FE Presidential Directors Allan Yeo, Tilly Kong, Goh Tian Chye, Kenny Yik, Loh Chow Huat and upcoming leader FE Director Master Siew for organizing and conducting the successful workshop! SEE YOU ALL AT THE TOP!
